Twisted Metal is a series created by writers Rhett Reese & Paul Wernick (of Zombieland, Deadpool 1 & 2, Life, Spiderhead) with Michael Jonathan Smith, who remains as showrunner. Episodes directed by Phil Sgriccia, Bill Benz, Iain MacDonald, Bertie Ellwood.
